channel.title: A somewhat easy problem
channel.description:
Hey, here is what's happening...
Every server I run it works both for me and people out of my network..
I got this new client and server from my friend, however, the sever runs fine but, the client doesn't load anymore than the "Connecting to update" or something like that...I was thinking maybe the client is set to address to the wrong IP, but, I looked in the Loader.java and it's heading towards the correct address.
Is there another place to check also or is there something else wrong?

item.title: A somewhat easy problem
item.dc:creator: @Eric_E Eric E.
item.description:
@Eric_E wrote:

So…what are you trying to tell me now?

I have to wait for the client to load or I need to find the update class files?[br][br][size=1]Posted on: January 07, 2010, 07:20:15 pm[/size][hr]Bump!

Read full topic

item.title: A somewhat easy problem
item.dc:creator: @C4ll3r C4ll3r
item.description:
@C4ll3r wrote:

Nvm,

You’re wasting your time i realize that my last client haven’t got update classes…
maybe u just need to wait long

Sorry

Read full topic

item.title: A somewhat easy problem
item.dc:creator: @Eric_E Eric E.
item.description:
@Eric_E wrote:

Hah, funny…I don’t have any of those files…lol.

Does that mean I’ll have to get the original files from the person who created the client or can I just get those three files from anyone else and put them into my client?

Read full topic

item.title: A somewhat easy problem
item.dc:creator: @C4ll3r C4ll3r
item.description:
@C4ll3r wrote:

I dont know for sure but there are 3 files in your client that are called:
update.class
updater.class
updater.java

But i know for sure that it is not your ip because it will be great @ then no one can leech your client

Read full topic

item.dc:creator: @C4ll3r C4ll3r
item.description:
@C4ll3r wrote:

Its not your IP because if it is soo you cant play any servers…

Maybe there is something wrong in your update.java or something?
Btw this is Client sided…
